Key Match Events: Indiana Pacers picked up a 126-108 victory over the Phoenix Suns
Post-Match Reflections: Tyrese Haliburton admitted that this is the most fun he's had on the basketball court this season
Miscellaneous Highlights: Haliburton's numbers on the year (18.3 points, 8.8 assists, and 3.8 rebounds per game on 43.9% shooting) are down across the board from his breakout 2023-24 campaign
Others: The Pacers have won eight of their last 11 games
